content: a sister pattern to the home sweet home table runner this dish towel is the perfect addition to your boho or farmhouse chic style available as a free download this crochet project is made with budget-friendly worsted weight cotton yarn i used lily sugar n cream but you can use any worsted cotton on hand pattern includes a written and photo tutorial for the bobble detail notes are included to adjust length to preference please see below for legal info notes on sale and distribution feel free to sell what you make from this pattern giving credit to lady jay crochet for the design please do credit @ladyjaycrochet for the design when posting to social media use hashtag #ladyjaycrochet so i can see your finished masterpiece  please do not alter this pattern in any way and claim as your own design this pattern is offered as a free download courtesy of lady jay crochet please do not or alter in any way and sell it as your own pattern thank you pattern release may 10th 2020
